examples.example: 学校开展了一系列丰富多彩的活动，让同学们的校园生活更加充实有趣。

translate.english: The school has carried out a series of rich and colorful activities to make the campus life of students more fulfilling and interesting.

examples.example: 我们制定了一系列切实可行的计划，为未来的发展奠定了坚实基础。

translate.english: We have formulated a series of practical and feasible plans, laying a solid foundation for the future development.

examples.example: 我们推出了一系列优惠活动，吸引了众多顾客前来参与。

translate.english: We launched a series of preferential activities and attracted a large number of customers to come and participate.
